Discounts

We offer stackable discounts to people and causes we believe in. Here are some of the most important causes we support.

  • Open-Source & Free Software
  • Small Businesses
  • NHCA Members
  • Community Websites & Services

Open-Source & Free Software

Any software built and hosted entirely in line with either the GNU or the OSI guidelines will receive a 10% discount.

Small Businesses

This is assessed on a case-by-case basis, and it usually caries a modest 10% discount.

NHCA Members

Members of the NHCA (Northern Hills Community Association) are eligible for a 10% discount.

Community Websites & Services

Anything which broadly comes under the umbrella of community services: community gardens, book clubs, church groups, etc. are eligible for a 10% discount.
